sliders.title: TD-MIXVENT
sliders.description: In-line duct fans designed for high airflow and low noise in compact spaces like false ceilings and cabinets. Ideal for various HVAC applications.

sliders.title: TR SERIES
sliders.description: Energy Recovery Ventilators (ERVs) providing balanced ventilation and energy cost reduction. Suitable for residential and commercial applications.

sliders.title: TD-SILENT
sliders.description: Ultra-quiet in-line mixed flow fans for noise-sensitive applications. Ideal for residential and commercial ventilation.

sliders.title: IFFT JET FAN
sliders.description: Efficient air movement in underground parking garages and tunnels with minimal noise and energy consumption.
